channel.title: Aesthetic and colors of the Death Note
channel.description:
Heiya liars !
First of all, thank you dev team for listen my suggestion about the access of the deathnote, now i'm not bored anymore when i'm dead !
So i have 2 new suggestions which concern...The death note again ! :grin:
Its 2 simply thing (i think), First is to change the aesthetic of the death note. the second is to add 2 new colors.
In this case, screenshot are better than words so here a couple of thing i did for showing you and support my sugg :
So we have the classic death note here : https://puu.sh/zen39/24d416a1b8.png Now my new version : https://puu.sh/zeqn3/26f9a56fb6.png The 2 version sideby side for a better comparison : https://puu.sh/zeqVE/29f45ea14a.png
I think a more clear aesthetic death note like the one i did is way better. Its more "realistic", old fashioned paper like papyrus, its refreshing and its in agreement with the Logs Book and the Private Note. I can do other model if you like it.
Now the colours ! Purple for the Unseen : https://puu.sh/zen8k/60d1a12326.png R:115 V:3 B:115 #730373
Blue for the Blue Dragon : https://puu.sh/zenbc/ec21bea0a3.png R:0 V:162 B:255 #00a2ff
And for showing you in situation, here some exemple :
Blue with the classic death note : https://puu.sh/zentP/27fb394e24.png Blue with my new version of the death note : https://puu.sh/zenvG/083ca5f4bd.png Purple with the classic death note : https://puu.sh/zenAP/1c8a0ed3b3.png Purple with my new version of the death note : https://puu.sh/zenBL/45b55cd6ba.png
The blue and purple should be accessible for every faction (or not, dont like that but why not) Btw i used the same color reference of the .png logo of the unseen and BD for the colors (found in the wiki)
So i personally think that the 2 colour i suggest doesn't match with the classic death note (especially the blue, purple is ok) but its totally match with my version :thinking:
For the people who might gonna say "its not a drawing game" i consider the Death Note like super fun, even more in this type of game, it's little details like that who contribute to make the game better ! Buuut i can (hardly) understand you do not like this suggestion. Also Black and Red is a classic color match soo..
Anyway, thanks you for you attention :blush:
